title: Dead Rising 3 Apocalypse Edition 2014 RePack MULTi2-XaTaB
description:
:::::::::::: XATAB PRESENTS ::::::::::::


:::: Dead Rising 3 Apocalypse Edition 2014 RePack MULTi2 ::::


::Information::


Year: September 4, 2014
Genre: Action Games, Survival horror, open world
Developer: Capcom Game Studio Vancouver
Publisher: Capcom
Platform: PC
Publication Type: RePack
Language: Russian / English
Language: Russian / English
Crack: enclosing (CODEX)


::Description::


After the events of Dead Rising 2 Ten years have passed, but the zombies 
continue to threaten people's lives.


::System Requirements::


Operating System: Windows Vista (64), Windows 7 (64), Windows 8 (64)
Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 @ 3.30GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.00 GHz
Memory: 6 GB
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570-670 | AMD Radeon 7870-7970
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX9.0
Free space on hard disk: 25 GB


::RePack Features::


- The basis is taken from the Steam-Rip RG GameWorks (Uploaded: September 4, 2014)
- Cut all voice except Russian and English / no recoded
- Unlock FPS
- Game Version 1.0.
- Unlock Apocalypse Edition: dpolneniya Untold Stories of Los Perdidos: Operation       - Broken Eagle, Fallen Angel, Chaos Rising, The Last Agent
- Installation time 25 minutes 
- Repack by xatab 
- Changing the language in the game settings


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT Goes to XaTaB for Repacking and Distribution.
